attributes.action: Sack all MPs for their shambolic representation of the UK public
attributes.background: I like most of the UK population do not believe that the UK government and members of the parliament have represented the UKs decision to leave the EU.  Every decision made by parliament have been for personal gain and interest. Not for the people.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
